attributes.action: stop police and councils criminalising innocent pets
attributes.additional_details: Tell the goverment to stop the police and councils from crimminalising innocent dogs befor it gets out of hand ,which i think its on its way now,if something happens with shep dogs they could be after them next,we have to act now and stop the lynch mob rule which is how the police and councils are behaving in trying to put to sleep innocent animals,they have to see that to us the dogs are are kids,and anyone with sense would not keep a dangerous dog,
